method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the XMLElement.

parameter.name: markupTag
parameter.shortdesc: The XML tag used to identify the element. Can accept: String or XMLTag.

parameter.name: xmlContent
parameter.shortdesc: The content to be marked up. Can accept: Text, Story, PageItem, Movie, Sound, Graphic, Table or Cell. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new XMLElement &#40;Optional)

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLElement with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLElement with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLElements within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The XMLElement, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: XMLElement, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The XMLElement, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: XMLElement, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first XMLElement in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last XMLElement in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle XMLElement in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLElement with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the XMLElement that follows the desired XMLElement.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLElement whose index follows the specified XMLElement in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The XMLElement whose index comes before the desired XMLElement.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any XMLElement in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every XMLElement in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLElement.
Returns the XMLElement with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
